name: Close by
description:
Close by is a little horror game, made for a modul at uni.
You are trapped in a maze and hav to find the exit-portal.
But it is not as easy as it sounds. Running through three Bioms, monsters are waiting to kill you.
Avoid the monster by listening where thier steps are comming from.
Still to easy? The maze is new every time and comes in five sizes, from easy 5x5 to impossible 80x80.
